subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With Alex Rodriguez back in the lineup, Mark Teixeira said he is more at ease, and the numbers back him up. He is batting .367 with 11 homers, 32 R.B.I. since Rodriguez’s return.
snippet: With Alex Rodriguez back in the lineup, Mark Teixeira said he is more at ease, and the numbers back him up. He is batting .367 with 11 homers, 32 R.B.I. since Rodriguez’s return.
